basic.description:
Chamber music experience for qualified instrumentalists and singers. Credit attained only with regular attendance, active participation, and ample preparation.
NOTE    Placement is made at the discretion of the School of Music.
LEARNING HOURS    168 (72Pc;96P)
basic.subject: MUSC
basic.title: Unspecified Chamber Ensemble

extra.enrollment_requirement: PREREQUISITE    Level 2 and registration in a BMUS Program, or permission of the School, upon audition.
